node.title: One dead in Taranaki police shooting
node.description: A post-mortem is being carried out on the body of a man shot by police in New Plymouth yesterday.
node.content:
["A post-mortem is being carried out on the body of a man shot by police in New Plymouth yesterday.", "", "
Police say the shooting occurred while they were conducting a vehicle stop on Devon Road. Photo: RNZ / Patrice Allen
", "Police confirmed the shooting in a statement late last night.", "They said it occurred while they were conducting a vehicle stop on Devon Road about 9.30pm.", "Medical assistance was immediately provided, however the person died at the scene, the statement added.", "Police said last night that they were working to identify the person and to notify their next of kin.", "A critical incident investigation has been started, the Independent Police Conduct Authority has been notified, and the officers involved are being supported.", "A section of highway between Mountain Road and De Havilland Drive remains closed while the scene is examined and a detour is in place."]
